file.name: oas30-2019.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: Api that uses Json Schema Document
  version: "1.0"
paths:
  /something:
    get:
      description: something
      responses:
        "200":
          description: something else
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: ../schemas/simple-2019.json#/$defs/Person
